name: drupal/redis
description: Integration of Drupal with the Redis key-value store.

suggest.ext-redis: Required to use the PhpRedis as redis driver (^4.0|^5.0).
suggest.ext-relay: Required to use the Relay as Redis driver (^0.5|^1.0).
suggest.predis/predis: Required to use the Predis as redis driver (^1.1|^2.0).
